data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Loudi, Hunan, China, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Loudi, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Loudi, Hunan, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Loudi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the county of Loudi against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Han Chinese, Xiang people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Loudi, Hunan, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 54,537 believers in Loudi to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Loudi, Hunan, China has a population of 718,900.

We estimate Loudi has 54,537 people who might know Jesus, 11,614 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 652,750 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Loudi. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
